data.name: A_ExitArgs
data.comment: A list of different names which will stop the application. The elements are seperated using the A_ExitSep variable. At least 1 element should be in the list.

data.name: A_ExitSep
data.comment: The seperated between the exit commands in the A_ExitArgs list.

data.name: A_WindowName
data.value: Multimedia Retrieval - K. Westerbaan & G. de Jonge
data.comment: The title of the window which will be created by the application.

data.name: D_ContentDir
data.comment: The directory which will be used to save all the content files to.

data.name: D_FailedDir
data.comment: The directory which will contain all the shapes that could not be refined by this program.

data.name: D_FeatureDir
data.comment: The directory which will contain the different extracted feature vectors.

data.name: D_FeatureFile
data.comment: The file where all the features/descriptors will be saved in.

data.name: D_FinalDir
data.comment: The directory which will contain all the shapes that have fully been refined by the program.

data.name: D_InitialDir
data.comment: The directory which will contain the initial shapes that need to be processed.

data.name: D_MeasureDir
data.comment: The directory which will contain the different extracted measurements/statistics.

data.name: D_MeasureFile
data.comment: The file where all the statistics/measurements will be saved in.

data.name: D_ShapesDir
data.comment: The directory which will contain all the shape files.

data.name: D_TempDir
data.comment: The directory which will store all the shapes during processing phase, this map is temporary.

data.name: EX_Directoy_NotExist
data.value: The provided directory does not exist '{0}'.
data.comment: The exception which is given when an attempt is made to read from a directory which does not exist.

data.name: EX_Dubble_Snapshot
data.value: The current record already contains a snapshot. Please reset the RecordHolder first before taking another snapshot.
data.comment: The exception which is given when there is an attempt to make another snapshot while a previous one is still stored in it.

data.name: EX_EndOfStream
data.value: Cannot read data from the end of a stream.
data.comment: The exception which is given when an attempt to read from the end of a file is given.

data.name: EX_FileNotFound
data.value: Could not load file '{0}' because it does not exist.
data.comment: The exception which is given when a file could not be read because it could not be found on the device.

data.name: EX_FileNotLoad
data.value: Could not load file '{0}' because of an Exception.
data.comment: The exception which is given when a file could not be read because of another exception. This other exception will be shown after it and execution will continue without this part.

data.name: EX_G3_Writer
data.value: Cannot use the constructor without IOWriteResult variables.
data.comment: The exception which is given when an exception in a writer happens but the cause of the fail is not provided.

data.name: EX_Invalid_Format
data.value: The current class cannot read '{0}', expected format(s) '{1}'.
data.comment: The exception which is given when a format exception is called because of invalid formats.

data.name: EX_Invalid_Format_No_Args
data.value: The provided format could not be processed by this class.
data.comment: The exception which is given when a format exception is called withoutt specifying any arguments for the cause.

data.name: EX_Invalid_Vector_Size
data.value: Invalid vector size, expected size {0} but got '{1}'
data.comment: The exception which is given when an array could not be converted to a 3D vector because the dimensions weren't right.

data.name: EX_MinMax_Switch
data.value: The provided maximum value is below the minimum bound. The maximum value should always be larger than this minimum bound.
data.comment: The exception which is given when a maximum value is provided which is less than a minimum lower bound.

data.name: EX_Missing_Ext
data.value: No extension where provided for reader '{0}'. Add your own reader to the FileManager by using the AddReader(IReader<>) method.
data.comment: The exception which is given when an attempt to read a file is made that this application does not yet support.

data.name: F_DateFormat
data.comment: The format which is being used to visualise dates on exported files.

data.name: F_File_Measure
data.comment: The format for the names of measurement/statistic files.

data.name: I_EndClean
data.comment: Notify the user that old data has been deleted.

data.name: I_EndLoad_Mesh
data.comment: Notify the user that meshes have finished loading in for visualisation.

data.name: I_EndMeasure
data.comment: Notify that the meshes have finished being measured for statistic calculation.

data.name: I_EndProc_Feature
data.comment: Notify the user that the descriptors for all shapes have been calculated.

data.name: I_EndProc_Query
data.comment: Notify the user that the query pipeline has ended.

data.name: I_EndProc_Input
data.comment: Notify the end of input argument conversion.

data.name: I_EndProc_Mesh
data.comment: Notify that the meshes have finished processing.

data.name: I_ExitPropmt
data.value: Press enter to exit the application.
data.comment: Notify that an action needs to be taken to close the application.

data.name: I_Feature_Exp
data.comment: Notify that the featuress have been saved to a specified file.

data.name: I_Query_Exp
data.comment: Notify that the query results have been saved to a specified file.

data.name: I_Feature_Imp
data.comment: Notify that the features have been reloaded from the specified file.

data.name: I_Measure_Exp
data.comment: Notify that the measurements have been saved to a specified file.

data.name: I_ShapeCount
data.comment: Notify the user about the amount of shapes which have been loaded before enumerating the list.

data.name: I_ShapeSelect_Prompt
data.value: Please select a shape, or write down {0} to exit the program.
data.comment: Notify that an action needs to be taken to view a specific shape or exit the application.

data.name: I_StartClean
data.comment: Notify the user that old data is being deleted.

data.name: I_StartLoad_Mesh
data.comment: Notify the user that meshes are being loaded in for visualisation.

data.name: I_StartMeasure
data.comment: Notify that the meshes are now being measured for statistic calculation.

data.name: I_StartProc_Feature
data.comment: Notify the user that the descriptors for all shapes are being calculated.

data.name: I_StartProc_Query
data.comment: Notify that the query pipeline has started.

data.name: I_StartProc_Input
data.comment: Notify that the conversion of input arguments is in process.

data.name: I_StartProc_Mesh
data.comment: Notify that the meshes are now being processed.

data.name: I_StartUp
data.comment: Notify that the application has started up.

data.name: I_UnknownCommand
data.comment: Notify the user that the given action cannot be completed by this application.

data.name: EX_ExpPosValue
data.value: The provided number had a negative value while this function only excepts positive values. Given value {0}.
data.comment: The exception which is given when a negative number is provided to a method which only accepts positive ones.

data.name: EX_UnEqual_Sizes
data.value: The provided arrays do not have the same size, all should be of the same length. Expected Size: {0}, Given Size {1}.
data.comment: The exception which is given when 2 or more arrays are provided of different lengths when all should have the exact same element count.

data.name: EX_Empty_Array
data.value: The given array is empty, this method does not accept arrays without values.
data.comment: The exception which is given when an empty array is provided while its values are important.

data.name: D_QueryDir
data.comment: The directory which will contain all the query shapes which needs to be compared with our stored database.

data.name: D_QueryFile
data.comment: The file where all the similar files with their scores will be saved in.

data.name: EX_Not_Supported
data.value: Operations for the given data is currently not supported: {0}
data.comment: The exception which is given when a method has not implementated a reaction for a specific type or argument input. Developers should write extensions for it.

data.name: F_MeshName
data.comment: The format to use in files to describe the name of a mesh.

data.name: D_SettingsFile
data.comment: The file where all the application settings will be stored in.
